column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Significantly underpaid and naive employees are being taken advantage of when working here
column2: their bosses are money hungry and do not care about the safety of you nor their own employees. they are also extremely unprofessional when addressing concerns
column3: a former employee was fired with little to no reason as there was a disagreement that MASKS should be worn for employees and unprofessionalism can be see in their Instagram comments. this is a disgusting company and there are many others you can support that fairly pay their workers. mind you they were previously paid a dollar and hour and recently was ONLY RAISED A DOLLAR but no hazard pay. horrific
